description: Map of Minneapolis mounted on foam core and placed in an acrylic red frame with clear back; shades of red enamel cover map and frame except for a small area at center; one mounting hole at each corner.
signed: Verso on foam core in black marker at center and ULC [#57 (Arrow up) / \"Minneapolis\" 1991 / (18 5/16\" x 15 15/16\") / artist\'s signature]; verso on clear acrylic in black marker at bottom: [Dear Frank: / Next time I see you we do this. /  Paint the town Red! Best of luck / Your pal James]
title: Minneapolis
